channel.title: How do u add items to horviks shop?
channel.description:
Hi, i would like to know how i may add items into horviks shop on cheezscape. Currently he has no items to sell. I would like to know what the command is and where it goes.
tyvm bode[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 08:37:42 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know?

item.title: How do u add items to horviks shop?
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

shops.cfg, find his shop, go to the end of that line, add then item id then press tab, and type down the ammount for it to sell, then press tab again and enter in another item id, once again tab and put how many you want of that item to be in shop

Read full topic
